1.text: Now these were the sons of David that were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn Amnon of Achinoam the Jezrahelitess, the second Daniel of Abigail the Carmelitess.

2.text: The third Absalom the son of Maacha the daughter of Tolmai king of Gessur, the fourth Adonias the son of Aggith,

3.text: The fifth Saphatias of Abital, the sixth Jethrahem of Egla, his wife.

4.text: So six sons were born to him in Hebron, where he reigned seven years and six months. And in Jerusalem he reigned three and thirty years.

5.text: And these sons were born to him in Jerusalem: Simmaa, and Sobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four of Bethsabee the daughter of Ammiel.

7.text: And Eliphaleeh, and Noge, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

8.text: And Elisama, and Eliada, and Elipheleth, nine:

9.text: All these the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines: and they had a sister Thamar.

10.text: And Solomonâ€™s son was Roboam: whose son Abia beget Asa. And his son was Josaphat,

11.text: The father of Joram: and Joram be- got Ochozias, of whom was born Joas:

12.text: And his son Amasias begot Azarias. And Joathan the son of Azarias

13.text: Beget Achaz, the father of Ezechias, of whom was born Manasses.

14.text: And Manasses beget Amen the father of Josias.

15.text: And the sons of Josias were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Joakim, the third Sedecias, the fourth Sellum.

16.text: Of Joakim was born Jechonias, and Sedecias.

17.text: The sons of Jechonias were Asir, Salathiel,

18.text: Melchiram, Phadaia, Senneser and Jecemia, Sama, and Nadabia.

19.text: Of Phadaia were born Zorobabel and Semei. Zorobabel beget Mosollam, Hananias, and Salomith their sister:

20.text: Hasaba also, and Ohol, and Barachias, and Hasadias, Josabhesed, five.

21.text: And the son of Hananias was Phaltias the father of Jeseias, whose son was Raphaia. And his son was Arnan, of whom was born Obdia, whose son was Sechenias.

22.text: The son of Sechenias, was Semeia, whose sons were Hattus, and Jegaal, and Baria, and Naaria, and Saphat, six in number.

23.text: The sons of Naaria, Elioenai, and Ezechias, and Ezricam, three.

24.text: The sons of Elioenai, Oduia, and Eliasub, and Pheleia, and Accub, and Johanan, and Dalaia, and Anani, seven.
